description: This is a delicious citrus treat that is nice and fluffy and quick/easy to make.
name: Lemon Cheesecake Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crush biscuits in a blender or with rolling pin until fine crumbs. Add the melted Nuttelex or butter and mix together. Put approx 1tbsp of the crumbs at the bottom of your containers/cups.

Using an electric mixer - whisk the cream in a mixing bowl until whipped to peaks. In a separate mixing bowl, whisk the cream cheese until this is smooth. Add the icing sugar and lemon curd and continue to mix together along with a couple of drops of food colouring.
Pour lemon juice and water in a glass bowl and sprinkle gelatin on top. Stir and let sit for 5 minutes.
Heat rested gelatin on high in a microwave for 30 seconds. Stir thoroughly for 1 minute. Let sit (no longer than 3 minutes or this will start to set and give you lumps in mixture).
Once the gelatin mix has cooled, add this slowly into the cream cheese mixture and continue mixing for a minute until combined. Fold in gently the whipped cream to this bowl, until combined.
Spoon (or pipe / ziplock bag) over of the crumb mixture in individual cups. Refrigerate for 2 hours (or overnight)
Serve topped with your preference - whipped cream, berries, mint leaves etc. Enjoy!
